title: Quarantine a Recalled Product
description: A supplier has issued a recall for a specific batch of a product. An inventory manager must find all units from that batch and place them on hold.

tasks.description: Receive the recall notification with the product ID and batch number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the specific recall information.

tasks.description: Search the WMS for all locations containing the specified product and batch number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all bins holding the recalled product.

tasks.description: Apply a 'QA Hold' status to all inventory of that batch, making it unpickable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the inventory on hold.

tasks.description: Create tasks for operators to move the held inventory to a designated quarantine area.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates move tasks to isolate the recalled product.
